maqras.text: aur yah ki meree yaatana bhee atyant dukhadaayinee yaatana hai
aur unhen ibaraaheem ke atithiyon ka vrttaant sunao
jab ve usake yahaan aae aur unhonne salaam kiya to usane kaha, "hamen to tumase dar lag raha hai.
ve bole, "daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanavaan putr kee shubh soochana dete hai.
usane kaha, "kya tum mujhe shubh soochana de rahe ho, is avastha mein ki mera budhaapa aa gaya hai? to ab mujhe kis baat kee shubh soochana de rahe ho
unhonne kaha, "ham tumhen sachchee shubh soochana de rahe hain, to tum niraash na ho
usane kaha, "apane rab kee dayaaluta se pathabhrashton ke siva aur kaun niraash hoga
usane kaha, "ai dooto, tum kis abhiyaan par aae ho
ve bole, "ham to ek aparaadhee qaum kee or bheje gae hai
sivaay loot ke gharavaalon ke. un sabako to ham bacha lenge
sivaay usakee patnee ke - hamane nishchit kar diya hai, vah to peechhe rah jaanevaalon mein rahengee.
phir jab ye doot loot ke yahaan pahunche
to usane kaha, "tum to aparichit log ho.
unhonne kaha, "nahin, balki ham to tumhaare paas vahee cheez lekar aae hai, jisake vishay mein ve sandeh kar rahe the
aur ham tumhaare paas yaqeenee cheez lekar aae hai, aur ham bilakul sach kah rahe hai

atev ab tum apane gharavaalon ko lekar raatri ke kisee hisse mein nikal jao, aur svayan un sabake peechhe-peechhe chalo. aur tumamen se koee bhee peechhe mudakar na dekhe. bas chale jao, jidhar ka tumhe aadesh hai.
hamane use apana yah faisala pahuncha diya ki praatah hote-hote unakee jad kat chukee hogee
itane mein nagar ke log khush-khush aa pahunche
usane kaha, "ye mere atithi hai. meree fazeehat mat karana
allaah ka dar rakho, mujhe rusava na karo.
unhonne kaha, "kya hamane tumhen duniya bhar ke logon ka zimma lene se roka nahin tha
usane kaha, "tumako yadi kuchh karana hai, to ye meree (qaum kee) betiyaan (vidhitah vivaah ke lie) maujood hai.
tumhaare jeevan kee saugandh, ve apanee mastee mein khoe hue the
antatah pau phatate-phatate ek bhayankar aavaaz ne unhen aa liya
aur hamane us bastee ko talapat kar diya, aur unapar kankareele patthar barasae
nishchay hee isamen bhaapanevaalon ke lie nishaaniyaan hai
aur vah (bastee) saarvajanik maarg par hai
nishchay hee isamen mominon ke lie ek badee nishaanee hai
aur nishchay hee aisa vaale bhee atyaachaaree the
phir hamane unase bhee badala liya, aur ye donon (bhoo-bhaag) khule maarg par sthit hai
hijravaale bhee rasoolon ko jhuthala chuke hai
hamane to unhen apanee nishaaniyaan pradaan kee thee, parantu ve unakee upeksha hee karate rahe
ve badee befikree se pahaado ko kaat-kaatakar ghar banaate the
antatah ek bhayaanak aavaaz ne praatah hote- hote unhen aa liya
phir jo kuchh ve kamaate rahe, vah unake kuchh kaam na aa saka

hamane to aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake madhy hai, soddeshy paida kiya hai, aur vah qiyaamat kee ghadee to anivaaryatah aanevaalee hai. atah tum bhalee prakaar daraguzar (kshama) se kaam lo
nishchay hee tumhaara rab hee bada paida karanevaala, sab kuchh jaananevaala hai
hamane tumhen saat masaanee ka samooh yaanee mahaan quraan diya
jo kuchh sukh-saamagree hamane unamen se vibhinn prakaar ke logon ko dee hai, tum usapar apanee aankhen na pasaaro aur na unapar dukhee ho, tum to apanee bhujaen mominon ke lie jhukae rakho
aur kah do, "main to saaf-saaf chetaavanee denevaala hoon.
jis prakaar hamane hissa-bakhara karanevaalon par utaara tha
jinhonne (apane) quraan ko tukade-tukade kar daala
ab tumhaare rab kee qasam! ham avashy hee un sabase usake vishay mein poochhenge
jo kuchh ve karate rahe.
atah tumhen jis cheez ka aadesh hua hai, use haank-pukaarakar bayaan kar do, aur mushariko kee or dhyaan na do
upahaas karanevaalon ke lie ham tumhaaree or se kaafee hai
jo allaah ke saath doosaron ko poojy-prabhu thaharaate hai, to sheeghr hee unhen maaloom ho jaega
ham jaanate hai ki ve jo kuchh kahate hai, usase tumhaara dil tang hota hai
to tum apane rab ka gunagaan karo aur sajada karanevaalon mein sammilit raho
aur apane rab kee bandagee mein lage raho, yahaan tak ki jo yaqeenee hai, vah tumhaare saamane aa jae
